text:
@charliekirk11 Trump says he knew nothing of the 2018 firing of the pandemic response team, but a video shows him saying he did it to save money.
He's lying now.
He did it. 
He did it to us. 
He's to blame.
He made things much worse.

https://t.co/VAVi9DMV1f
